column3: Test Case Description
column4: Expected Result

column3:
Social Mobilizer can be added in two ways:
1. Registration from Mobilizer app
2. Adding Social Mobilizer from agency app
column4: System should allow system users to add Social Mobilizer from agency app

column3: Mobilizer app is used by Social Mobilizers to track the rahat distribution
column4: System should be connected to Rahat Mobilizer app
column7: The Agency app is connected to Vendor app. The vendor Activities of Vendor app is updated in Agency app

column2: Verify Add new Social Mobilizer from Mobilizer app
column3: Social Mobilizers can register account using Rahat Mobilizer app
column4: System should add new Social Mobilizer as they register from Mobilizer app
column7: after Mobilizer registers from Mobilizer app, agency app recieves a new social mobilizer.

column2: Verify Notification of Registration from Mobilizer app
column3: Social Mobilizers can register account using Rahat Mobilizer app which is notified to agency app
column4: System should get an notification as Social Mobilizer register in Mobilizer app
column7: The notification feature is not available at the moment

column3: After Social Mobilizer register from Mobilizer app, he/she needs approval from agency
column4: system users should be able to approve/reject  the registerd Social Mobilizers.
column7: Agency app Users can approve the vendor but cannot reject the vendor

column3: To approve the Social mobilizr agency needs to assign project to the mobilizr
column4: System user should be able to assign project to the mobilizer while approving the regitratio request.
column7: Agency can assign social mobilizer before final approval

column3: After approving the Social Mobilizer, Social Mobilizer can be active or suspend status
column4: System users should be able to activate or deactivate the Social Mobilizers.
column7: Vendor canot be activated or suspened as per the reuirement .

column2: Verify Update Details of Social Mobilizer from Mobilizer app
column3: As Social Mobilizer register from Mobilizer app, his/her details are updated in the system
column4:
System should sync the details of Social Mobilizer from the Mobilizer app 
Profile Picture 
Social Mobilizer Status( Active/Suspend)
Name
Phone Number 
Address
Organization Name 
Email address
GOvt ID card
Digital Signature (optional)
MOU (optional)
column7:

These are not available Digital Signature (optional)

column2: Verify Store Profile picture of Social Mobilizer
column3: Social Mobilizer can click their Profile picture from Mobilizer app
column4: The profile photo should be stored in Agency app

column2: Verify Store Govenrment ID photo of Social Mobilizer

column4: The government ID photo should be stored in Agency app

column2: Verify Store digita signature of Social Mobilizer
column3: Social Mobilizer can upload their signature digitally from Mobilizer app
column4: Social Mobilizers digital signature should be stored in Agency app

column2: Verify Store MOU of Social Mobilizer
column3: Social Mobilizer can upload MOU from Mobilizer app
column4: The MOU file should be stored in Agency app

column2: Verify View List of Social Mobilizers
column3: Social Mobilizers can be added from Agency app and Mobilizer app. Both the vedors are displyed in agency app
column4: Social Mobilizers added from agency app and Social Mobilizers registered from Mobilizer app should be listed in Agency app
column7: Soial Mobilizers registered are listed in agency app

column2: Veirfy View Social Mobilizer List in Project
column3: You can see the list of Social Mobilizers registered to a project in project details as well.
column4: The added and assigned social mobilizers should be shown in Project details>Social Mobilizer  List

column2: Verify add Social Mobilizer   in Dashboard
column3: After registering a new Social Mobilizer , the number of Social Mobilizer will be increasd in Dashboard as well
column4: The number of Social Mobilizer should be increased after registering a new Social Mobilizer

column3: All the information of the Social Mobilizer is shown in Agency app
column4: System Users should be able to view all the details of Social Mobilizer

column3: The Details of Social Mobilizer can be edited if required
column4: System User should be able to edit the details of Social Mobilizer

column3: All the Social Mobilizer details can be edited except the wallet address
column4: System Users should be restricted to edit the Wallet address of Social Mobilizer

column3: If Social Mobilizers have not uploded the documents like MOU , Digital Signature, they can be uploaded by agency as well
column4: System Users should be able to upload the missing documents of Social Mobilizer.

column2: Verify Social Mobilizer Assign to project
column3: Social Mobilizers can be assigned to particluar /multiple projects
column4: System Users should be able to assign Social Mobilizers to one or multiple projects

column3: Social Mobilizers can be assigned to particluar /multiple projects
column4: System users should be able to view list of projects they are assigned to

column3: Social Mobilizer will add the beneficiries in Rahat application. Agency can track the actions of Social mobilizer
column4: System User should be able to track the Transaction of Social Mobilizer from agency app

column3: You can search for the Social Mobilizer by Name
column4: System user should be able to search the Social Mobilizer by Name

column3: You can search for the Social Mobilizer by Phone Number
column4: System user should be able to search the Social Mobilizer by Phone Number

column3: You can also filter the Social Mobilizer as per the Social Mobilizer status
